title: Fun Comes With Cookies!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Wow! Everyone is already putting up Christmas decorations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You’re right~ They went up immediately after Halloween.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby loves decorating for Christmas.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Me too! I’m thinking about what we should do for our Christmas party. Aren’t you also excited just thinking about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I heard from Emmacchi that in other countries, they bake tons of cookies before Christmas and eat them up as they wait for Christmas Day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Wow, that’s awesome......! Ruby should bake cookies with her big sister.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I should bake some with my big sister, too 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Huh? Ai-san, you have a big sister too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah~! She’s a neighbor, but to me, she’s family! There are so many stories about her that I could tell!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
